sqlMap.select: SELECT id, title, author, publisher, year, copyright, text FROM tblSongs ORDER BY title ASC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO tblSongs (title, author, publisher, year, copyright, text) VALUES (#title#, #author#, #publisher#, #year#, #copyright#, #text#)
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tblSongs SET title = #title#, author = #author#, publisher = #publisher#, year = #year#, copyright = #copyright#, text = #text# WHERE id = #id#
